iSpit

Class Tank

  • java.lang.Object
    • iSpit.Tank
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Commons, java.io.Serializable

    public class Tank
extends java.lang.Object
implements Commons, java.io.Serializable
    Class used for creating tank instances. A tank is a graphical representation of a player and can be controlled by the user
    Author:
    Dan-Eduard Petrescu
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface iSpit.Commons

        Commons.Direction, Commons.Players

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface iSpit.Commons

        BRICK_HEIGHT, BRICK_WIDTH, BULLET_HEIGHT, BULLET_WIDTH, PANEL_HEIGHT, PANEL_WIDTH, TANK_HEIGHT, TANK_SPEED, TANK_WIDTH

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Tank(Commons.Players player)
      Creates an instance of Tank with 3 lives

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
